bibl.title: New Light on the Patermouthis Archive from Excavations at Aswan. When Archaeology and Papyrology Meet. Avec résumé en anglais.

The Findspot of the Patermouthis Archive: Elephantine or Aswan? - Conclusion: The Patermouthis Archive and the Topography of Late Antique Syene.
